data.comment: The match has started.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 2, Atletico Mineiro's Alan Franco goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 4, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Sao Paulo's Tche Tche gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Luciano heads against the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Pablo Felipe's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 10, The match at Independencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rafael Monteiro, who is down injured.
Atletico Mineiro's Rafael Monteiro looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Hernanes for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Paulinho (Sao Paulo) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
In Belo Horizonte, Pablo Felipe of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 15, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 16, Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Pablo Felipe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 17, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In Belo Horizonte, Junior Alonso (Atletico Mineiro) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 21, In Belo Horizonte Sao Paulo drive forward through Liziero. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Belo Horizonte.
Gabriel of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Sao Paulo drives forward and Paulinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Liziero for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Sao Paulo drive forward but Luciano is judged offside.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 33, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Atletico Mineiro’s Igor Rabello and play has been suspended briefly.
Atletico Mineiro’s Igor Rabello is on his feet again at Independencia.
In the minute 35, Goal! Alan Franco gives Atletico Mineiro a 1-0 lead.
Jair instrumental with a fine assist.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima waits before resuming play because Keno for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Keno returns to the field for Atletico Mineiro after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 39, Sao Paulo pushes forward through Hernanes, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Belo Horizonte to check on Allan, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Allan has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
Important block from the Sao Paulo defence as Guilherme Arana fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 42, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro push forward at Independencia and Hyoran gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sao Paulo defence.
In the minute 45, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Sao Paulo.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
In the minute 45, At Independencia the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, It's now 2-0 in Belo Horizonte as Alan Franco scores for Atletico Mineiro.
Hyoran with an assist there.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Vitor Bueno is replacing Gabriel for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 50, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 51, Keno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sao Paulo needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, The away team replace Hernanes with Igor Gomes.
Brenner is replacing Paulinho for the away team.
In the minute 55, Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Keno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 59, Atletico Mineiro move into a 3-0 lead through a Jair header.
That's a fine assist from Junior Alonso.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Sao Paulo drive upfield and Pablo Felipe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico Mineiro defender.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo's Liziero gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Atletico Mineiro drive into the zone and Keno is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Marquinhos is on a sub for Keno for Atletico Mineiro.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marquinhos of Atletico Mineiro is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, The away team have replaced Pablo Felipe with Jonas Toro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
Marquinhos (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 80, Jair is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's second substitution at Independencia with Marrony replacing Hyoran.
Atletico Mineiro make their third substitution with Jefferson Savarino replacing Eduardo Sasha.
In the minute 81, The home team has substituted Jair with Guga. Jorge Sampaoli is thus making his fourth change.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 86, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Fabio Santos is replacing Guilherme Arana for the home team.
Marquinhos for Atletico Mineiro is whistled offside.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Independencia.
Jean Pierre Goncalves Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino has run offside.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Marrony for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
